ee:transform.doc:name: Set Correlation Id And Input Payload

logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionId: #[vars.transactionId], correlationId: #[vars.correlationId], The flow to register covid case started: #[vars.inputPayload]

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionId: #[vars.transactionId], correlationId: #[vars.correlationId], The flow to register covid case completed: #[vars.inputPayload]
